item.description:
Hi All,
ACONE and the QBs along with the FPA will be hosting a memorial for Reese Dill. Located at Hanscom Field at Signature Aviation from 6:00 - 8:30.

We can either fly into KBED or drive. Those that want to go together, we can meet at FCA flight center possibly meet for dinner and go from there, drive or fly. Others that live closer can just meet us there.

Please look at the link below for more specific details.

If anyone has some good Reese stories, please send them along.

Be great to have a proper show up for Reese.

For details please go to this link.

http://www.acone.org/...

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Memorial for Reese Dill
